author: GamingBolt
description:
Death Stranding 2 is almost upon us, and with the long awaited sequel's launch almost upon us, excitement among fans of auteur Hideo Kojima's works is continuing to mount. 

With the game's release not long far away now, here, after having dived deep into the world of the upcoming PS5 exclusive, here, we're going to go over a few beginner's tips and tricks that you should keep in mind about Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, some that will be familiar to fans of the first game, others that won't be.
title: 15 Beginners Tips And Tricks Death Stranding 2 Doesn't Tell You

author: GamingBolt
description:
Death Stranding 2 is definitely an impressive piece of technology; it feels like a complete package. Kojima Productions has made great use of current-gen technology, not just in the graphics department but also the 3D audio to deliver something that feels like the fully realized vision of Death Stranding. 

It definitely shares the same DNA as its predecessor, but the incremental upgrades in each aspect do build up to create a significant improvement in the final product.
title: Death Stranding 2 PS5 Tech Analysis - These Are The Kind of Graphics We Deserve

author: GamingBolt
description:
Death Stranding 2: On the Beach takes the unique foundation of its first game and builds on it confidently and smartly, coming across as a more diverse, engaging, and mechanically interesting gameplay experience. 

Narratively, the game has a lot of interesting things to say, even if it can be a bit too heavy-handed and clunky at times- which, to be frank, is almost to be expected with Hideo Kojima games. I expect that Death Stranding 2 is still going to be a divisive experience, even if it isn't quite as divisive as the first game was, because at its core, this is still definitely more Death Stranding- but it's not just more, it's also better, more confident, and better designed.
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Review - The Final Verdict
